    Dr. Toast - "Gravity is Quiet" (2011)

    posted July 6, 2011



    Over 3 years in the making, "Gravity is Quiet" represents an evolution of the Dr. Toast sound into new intricate realms of texture and color. Download it now in your favorite high-quality format (MP3, FLAC, etc) from drtoast.bandcamp.com. Name your price! (even if it's nothing!)

    False Profit Records FPR-108 - 9 tracks - 43min 18sec
